mapper.select: SELECT EA.* , IFNULL(SEA.save, 0) AS save FROM event_Article AS EA LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM saveEventArticle WHERE memberId = #{loginedMemberId} ) AS SEA ON EA.id = SEA.relId WHERE SEA.save = 1 ORDER BY SEA.regDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saveEventArticle SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), memberId = #{loginedMemberId}, relTypeCode = #{relTypeCode}, relId = #{relId}
